timeline.message:
Remove obsolete renderJsonLayer method from mapAdapter

Our new approach to selecting offline imagery no longer requires us to
render a JSON layer, so we no longer need this method, nor the reference
to the JSON file.

timeline.bodyText:
We don't need to mention a custom tag. Timber uses the filename as the default tag.
So, the above can be written as Timber.v("Removing marker %s", marker.getId());
timeline.author: shobhitagarwal1612

replies.bodyText: This also makes TAG variable unused. So, please remove that as well
replies.author: shobhitagarwal1612

timeline.author: shobhitagarwal1612

timeline.message:
Remove unnecessary TAG constant from logging calls

Timber uses the filename as a tag by default! So, we don't need the
explicit tag. Thanks to shobhitagarwal1612@ for pointing this out!
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/google/ground-android into mapadapter-cleanup
Merge branch 'mapadapter-cleanup' of https://github.com/google/ground-android into mapadapter-cleanup
